PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-03382022-04-05,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActProceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Regulations and the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Administrative Monetary Penalties Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the PROCEEDS OF CRIME (MONEY LAUNDERING) AND TERRORIST FINANCING REGULATIONS and the PROCEEDS OF CRIME (MONEY LAUNDERING) AND TERRORIST FINANCING ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES REGULATIONS in order to (1) subject crowdfunding platforms to the existing requirements under the Act for payment service providers; (2) extend Canadaâ€™s Anti-Money Laundering and Anti-Terrorist Financing Regime to a broader range of payment service providers; and (3) designate new provisions as violations subject to administrative monetary penalties.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0076 Publication Date: 2022-04-27
AttachmentsAttachment
